Diff in brain function, like pancreas function in diabetic?

-Diabetes-die blood clots

It's Perinatal Anxiety and Depression Action (PANDA) Week (8-14 NOV).

1 in 3 mums will have a traumatic experience giving birth to their baby. It's a very common experience among #mothers

1 in 5 mums will experience perinatal anxiety and/or depression. Left untreated, these illnesses can have long-lasting impacts on the family.
